post.content:
Hi,

I have following problem running project Coska_MySchool in eclipse.

1. the files under WebContents folder are not copied to .deployables folder. so when I run the project I get http error 404

2. I manually copied the files to .deployables, and run the project; the login page is loaded OK, but when I click "login" link, the link points, IE tries to load page http://localhost:8080/search/search.do and the same 404 occurs.

3. The same problem occurs when it deployed to local tomcat server.

It seems like the <context-path> is not set, and Tomcat cannot find the files correctly. Could anyone help me wtih this?

I need to run this to test ruby/watir scripts.

Thanks,
